name: Lullaby
description: Lullaby is an iterative 2D side-scrolling game where you play as an exhausted office worker, returning home from a busy day, ready to sleep.  But before you head to bed, you have to finish as many house chores as you can. Be careful, because the more time you spend walking around the house, completing tasks, the more tired and slow you’ll get.  If you fail to finish the chores, you will have to face the consequences. Manage your energy wisely and make sure you get a good night sleep!
